components.name: Button
components.signature: Button({ id?, label, variant?, size?, attrs?, type? }) -> string

components.name: textField
components.signature: textField({ id?, label?, value?, placeholder? }) -> { wrapper, input }
components.notes: Use for simple text inputs like comma-separated pairs

components.name: selectField
components.signature: selectField({ id?, label?, value?, options: ({value,label}|[value,label])[] }) -> { wrapper, input }
components.returns: Labeled select styled with .ui-field/.ui-control and select.control
components.notes: Use across forms for consistent selects

components.name: makeGallerySubheader
components.signature: makeGallerySubheader({ title, href, onChange?, activeId?, emitInitial? }) -> { root, setActive(id,emit?), getActive(), attachSourcePane(host,{maxHeight?}) }
components.returns: Top subheader with left title link and centered Demo/Source tabs. Includes attachSourcePane() to style Source accordions with themed scroll and max-height.
components.notes: Removes bottom margin to align with title; use setActive('demo'|'source') to toggle panes

components.name: makePlayerConfigurator
components.signature: makePlayerConfigurator({ rows?, cols?, allowNoneFrom?, buildSelect, buildExtra?, buildName, modeFor, onSelectChange? }) -> { root, sels, names, extras, updateVisibility() }
components.returns: Configurable multi-row player setup using ControlsGrid with cascading None handling
components.notes: Builds N labeled rows; supports an optional middle control (e.g., Memory). Visibility cascades: row i shows only when row i-1 is not None.

components.name: makeControlsGrid
components.signature: makeControlsGrid({ cols?, gap? }) -> { root, addRow({ id?, label, a?, b?, c?, mode? }), getRow(id) }
components.returns: Labeled control rows with 1/2/3 control modes and fixed column widths
components.notes: Use mode 'one' for single control spanning columns 2–4, 'two' for left control spanning 2–3 with a right control in 4, and 'three' for distinct controls in 2/3/4. Customize column widths via cols option.

components.name: makeTabs
components.signature: makeTabs({ items: [{id,label}], activeId?, onChange? }) -> { root, setActive(id,emit?), getActive() }
components.notes: Reusable across pages; items ids drive tab selection

components.name: numberField
components.signature: numberField({ id?, label?, value?, min?, max?, step? }) -> { wrapper, input }
components.notes: Attach listeners to returned input; append wrapper into layouts

components.name: openModal
components.signature: openModal({ title, body (string|Element), actions: [{label,variant,onClick}]?, onClose? }) -> { close }
components.returns: Overlay modal; call close() to dismiss
components.notes: Actions auto-close after onClick; Escape closes

components.name: Card
components.signature: Card({ title, tagline?, img, link, alt? }) -> string

components.name: Accordion
components.returns: <details> element with provided summary and content

components.name: LighthouseIcon
components.returns: SVG element of a lighthouse (with or without beams)
components.notes: Use in game grid or UI accents

components.name: makeSelectPanels
components.signature: makeSelectPanels({ id?, label, options: [{id,label}], panels: Record<string, Element|()=>Element>, value?, noneId?, noneLabel?, onChange? }) -> { root, wrapper, select, panelHost, setActive(id,emit?), getActive() }
components.returns: Labeled styled select that shows one panel per selection (None hides panels)
components.notes: Preprends a 'None' option; panels can be Elements or factories; uses site field/control styling

components.name: HudStat
components.returns: Labeled value tile for HUD/status rows

components.notes: Use for rule chips and inline labels
